ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We are grateful to the Core facilities of Georgia State University for supporting the electron microscopic and FACS studies. This study was supported by grants R01 AI101047 and R01 AI 116835 from the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID) of the NIH. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and interpretation, or the decision to submit the work for publication. The content is solely the responsibility of the authors and does not necessarily represent the official views of the NIH.
